AA.description: Beginner users only need to fill in the App name, modify the following APASSWORD and AUUID as needed, and click the Deploy app button at the end of the page to start deployment
AA.value: If there is an error, please check the parameter format or try several times. When using a custom parameter, please fully understand its meaning first.

TOREnable.description: Aktifkan TOR, default nonaktif, diaktifkan apabila value true

CADDYIndexPage.description: Setelah penyesuaian CADDY deployment completed, click on the display page of View, refer to: https://github.com/mixool/kuhero/blob/master/etc/CADDYIndexPage.md

CADDYCONFIG.description: Customize the network address to read the configuration and run CADDY, please do not modify it if you are not familiar with the CADDY configuration

ROBOTS.description: The ROBOTS crawler rule switch, enabled by default, closed when modified to false

ROBOTSCONFIG.description: Customize ROBOTS crawler configuration, the default configuration prohibits all crawlers

SSEnable.description: SS switch, enabled by default, closed when modified to false

GOSTEnable.description: GOST switch, enabled by default, closed when modified to false

GOSTMETHOD.description: Customize GOST operating parameters, please do not modify if you are not familiar with GOST configuration

BROOKEnable.description: BROOK switch, enabled by default, closed when modified to false

V2RAYEnable.description: V2RAY switch, enabled by default, closed when modified to false

VMESSPATH.description: The path when V2RAY uses VMESS

VLESSPATH.description: The path when V2RAY uses VLESS

TROJANPATH.description: The path when V2RAY uses TROJAN

AUUID.description: UUID used by V2RAY, a website that can generate UUID: https://www.uuidgenerator.net

V2RAYCONFIG.description: Customize the network address to read the configuration and run V2RAY, please do not modify it if you are not familiar with the V2RAY configuration
